name: pyshelf
description: pyShelf is a lightweight self-hosted media management tool designed for organizing ebooks and publications. It allows browsing and downloading through a simple web UI.
features: Ebook organization: Organize and manage digital book collections with metadata and cover images.
Format support: Handle multiple ebook formats including EPUB, PDF, MOBI, and AZW.
Metadata extraction: Automatically extract book information including title, author, and publication details.
Web browsing: Browse your library through a clean, responsive web interface.
Search functionality: Find books quickly using search across titles, authors, and descriptions.
Download management: Download books directly through the web interface for offline reading.
Collection management: Organize books into collections, series, and custom categories.
Cover display: View book covers in grid or list layouts for visual library browsing.
Reading progress: Track which books you've read and mark favorites for easy access.
Lightweight design: Minimal resource requirements suitable for personal libraries on any hardware.
Mobile responsive: Access and download books from mobile devices with an optimized interface.
Bulk operations: Add multiple books simultaneously and perform batch metadata updates.
